item.description:
Mt Kilimanjaro Trek - Feb 9, 2013

Join Global Expeditions Club members from all over the US and Canada on this locally guided Trek to the top of Mt. Kilimanjaro!

Feb 9-15, 2013: Join your fellow GEC club members up the easiest & shortest route to Trek to the Top of Mt. Kilimanjaro. While still a major trek, it's also a major accomplishment to climb one of the 7 summits of the world. With the help of expert local guides & porters, you can summit the highest mountain on the African Continent.

Then, why not enjoy the optional group safari to the Serengeti and Ngorongoro Crater immediately following the trek and witness the world famous animal herd migration of millions of zebra, wildebeest, water buffalo and gazelles!

-----------------------------------------------------------------

GET THE SCOOP! Want to see what other club members are saying? Then check out the Global Expeditions Club's Testimonial Page.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Pricing and Booking:

For prices, details or to book your space on this tour, follow this link: www.HeadOutAdventures.com

PRICE: Price is normally $3,499, however the first 8 people to book will get a deeply discount price of $1,899... Book fast to get this price (see link below to book)

CLICK HERE to book your spot.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Included in this adventure:
* Fully guided climb of Kilimanjaro with experienced local mountain guides
* Porters to carry all your gear except your day bag and to set up camp for you
* Beautiful hotel with views of Mt. Kilimanjaro, an excellent restaurant, in-ground pool, high speed internet connectivity, clean rooms and a garden to relax in
* All on mountain meals included
* Tea, hot chocolate, and boiled and/or purified water on mountain
* All ground transportation between hotel and mountain included.
* All mountain and hiking fees and permits
* 4 nights in mountain huts
* 2 nights in excellent hotel
* All camp equipment and set up
* Breakfast at the hotel

Click Here For Complete Details and Booking.

Places Visited: group trek of Mt. Kilimanjaro, Marangu huts, Moshi Tanzania, Kibo summit, Gilman's Point

-----------------------------------------------------------------

This group tour is being organized by the Global Expeditions Club: an international adventure travel club with over 20,000+ members. Check out the Global Expeditions Club's Testimonial Page to see what members are saying about these trips.

The tour operator that they are using to coordinate, book and run this trip is: Head Out Adventures.

For more information visit their websites or contact the Global Expeditions Club at:

E-mail: info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com
Phone: 1.617.645.7689

And, of course, if you have any questions you can always contact me or one of the other organizers through a meetup email!!

Make Friends. Travel the World.
item.name: KILIMANJARO TREK: Marangu Route - 7 Days
